Previous: dalNext: das

√daś 'make offering'

present: [1.] dā́śati etc.   -- [2.] dāṣṭi   -- [5.] dāśnóti  

perfect: dadā́śa etc.  dádāśati  dádāśas  dádāśat  dadāśvā́ṅs  dāśvā́ṅs  dāśivā́ṅs  

[aorist: adāśīt  dāśiṣyati  dāśitā  ]

secondary: intensive: dādāś-   -- desiderative: didāśiṣa-   -- causative: adāśayat  

derivatives: dā́ś  -dā́śa AV.+  dāśú V.  dā́śuri V.
